alert.note: Alert for Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:09PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oldham, west central Moore and southeastern Hartley Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 308 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Channing, or 22 miles southwest of Dumas, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Channing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
